Html:
I am building a windows forms application that contains two windows forms. Each form contains a seperate GMapControl with its own GMapOverlay containing markers. The second form is designed to be a popup window. The problem I have is that when I close the second form and then try to interact with the map on the first form, the map on the first form disappears and is replaced with a big red cross. It seeems as if the map on form1 is deleted when I close form2. Can you please suggest why this is happening? Both forms have their own instance of the GMapControl so I am confused by what is causing this.

Cheers, Julian.
you are doing something wrong, try latest build
Thank you radioman! Latest build has fixed this.
